categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: 5W40 Synthetic motor oil is a high-quality lubricant that incorporates anti-wear protection, as well as protection against sludge and deposit formation. These oils are designed to provide improved oxidation resistance, improved deposit protection, better wear protection, and better low-temperature performance over the life of the oil.
categoryContex.title: ULTRA ACE SAE 5W40 API SN

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.title: ULTRA ACE SAE 10W40 API SN/CF4
categoryContex.desc: 5W40 Synthetic motor oil is a high-quality lubricant that incorporates anti-wear protection, as well as protection against sludge and deposit formation. These oils are designed to provide improved oxidation resistance, improved deposit protection, better wear protection, and better low-temperature performance over the life of the oil.

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: This is a Multi-grade oil for Gasoline and Diesel engines, formulated from high-quality virgin base oils and a number of additives, carefully selected for engine protection and performance. It contains low-ash additives to prolong the endurance of the catalyst and provides safe engine combustion in tough usage conditions.
categoryContex.title: ULTRA ULTRA SAE 15W40 API SL/CF

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: This is a Multi-grade oil for Gasoline and Diesel engines, formulated from high-quality virgin base oils and a number of additives, carefully selected for engine protection and performance. It contains low-ash additives to prolong the endurance of the catalyst and provides safe engine combustion in tough usage conditions.
categoryContex.title: ULTRA SAE 20W50 API SL,SJ,SG-CF4

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: This is a Multi-grade oil for Motorcycle and ToKtok, formulated from high-quality virgin base oils and a number of additives, carefully selected for engine protection and performance. It contains low-ash additives to prolong the endurance of the catalyst and provides safe engine combustion in tough usage conditions.
categoryContex.title: MAXXOL 4T  SAE 20W50 API SJ

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: is a high performance, heavy-duty diesel engine oil is formulated for use in a wide variety of European, Japanese, and North American diesel and petrol engines operating under the most severe service conditions. Designed to provide improved engine protection and increased oil life. It is compatible with low-e-mission engine technology used in road transport, construction, mining, and many other industries.
categoryContex.title: SUPREME VOLT SAE 15W40 API CI-4/SL

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: This motor oil is particularly suitable for fixed diesel engines for power generation of heavy trucks, working in warm climatic conditions.
categoryContex.title: SUPREME OVAL SAE 50 CF-4/SG

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: Hydraulic Oil 68 is exceptional quality, top achievement hydraulic oil developed to accommodate the appeal for environmentally acceptable hydraulic fluids. This product is based on synthetic, readily biodegradable esters. A high-performance, carefully selected additive package gives excellent anti-wear and extreme pressure properties as well as good thermal stability and corrosion protection. Inherently strong oxidation resistance anticipates gumming and drop accumulation at top temperatures. Because of the high natural VI of the base fluid and low pour point, the viscosity-temperature behavior allows for a very wide operating temperature range.
categoryContex.title: ULTRA TECH ISO 68

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: CONTEX Automatic transmission and power steering fluid for use in GM automatic transmissions pre 2005 and in many automatic transmissions where Dexron® (II or III) or Mercon performance is required. It is recommended for transmission systems, hydraulic systems, and power steering units manufactured worldwide requiring performance standards of ATF-III/M type fluids / DEXRON®-III (H), DEXRON®-III, DEXRON®-IIE, Type A Suffix A and MERCON® as well as Allison C-3 and C-4 fluids.
categoryContex.title: PRIME ATF DEXRON III

categoryContex.head: Contex
categoryContex.desc: This is a lubricant for gearboxes and rear axles with conical teeth or screw type. This oil is made with highly refined base oils containing anti-wear additives and an additive to lower the pour point.
categoryContex.title: GEAR OIL SAE 85W140 API GL-5
